mapper.select: SELECT tagName, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(alarmGroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF1' THEN '1호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmGroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF2' THEN '2호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmGroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF3' THEN '3호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmGroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF4' THEN '4호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmGroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF5' THEN '5호기' ELSE alarmGroup END AS alarmGroupLabel, alarmDesc, SUM(M01) AS m01, SUM(M02) AS m02, SUM(M03) AS m03, SUM(M04) AS m04, SUM(M05) AS m05, SUM(M06) AS m06, SUM(M07) AS m07, SUM(M08) AS m08, SUM(M09) AS m09, SUM(M10) AS m10, SUM(M11) AS m11, SUM(M12) AS m12, (SUM(m01) + SUM(m02) + SUM(m03) + SUM(m04) + SUM(m05) + SUM(m06) + SUM(m07) + SUM(m08) + SUM(m09) + SUM(m10) + SUM(m11) + SUM(m12)) AS total FROM ( SELECT tagname, alarmGroup, alarmdesc, IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '01' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M01', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '02' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M02', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '03' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M03', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '04' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M04', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '05' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M05', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '06' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M06', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '07' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M07', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '08' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M08', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '09' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M09', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '10' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M10', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '11' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M11', IFNULL(CASE WHEN mons = '12' THEN ccnt END, 0) AS 'M12' FROM ( SELECT tagname, alarmGroup, alarmdesc, SUBSTR(MAX(time), 6, 2) AS mons, COUNT(*) AS ccnt FROM ( SELECT * , LEAD(alarmstate) OVER (PARTITION BY tagname ORDER BY time) AS lead_alarmstate, LEAD(time) OVER (PARTITION BY tagname ORDER BY time) AS lead_alarmtime FROM ALARMDATA WHERE 1=1 AND (#{alarmGroup} IS NULL OR #{alarmGroup} = '' OR alarmgroup = #{alarmGroup}) AND substr(time, 1, 4) = #{time} ORDER BY time ) AS aa WHERE alarmstate != 'Clear' GROUP BY tagname, alarmGroup, SUBSTR(time, 6, 2) ORDER BY time ) AS bb ORDER BY tagname, alarmGroup ) AS cc GROUP BY tagname, alarmGroupLabel, alarmdesc
